description: The Satyr and the Peasant Family; Jan Steen (Dutch, 1626 - 1679); The Netherlands; about 1660 - 1662; Oil on canvas; 52.1 × 47.6 cm (20 1/2 × 18 3/4 in.); 69.PA.15; Formerly the property of the Philippson family of Brussels, looted by the Nazis, purchased by the Museum in 1969, and owned by the Museum pursuant to an agreement with the Philippson family in 2003; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
name: The Satyr and the Peasant Family
